section.title: Description
section.p: The act of transferring a patient from one location or responsible organization to another. Note that a transfer from organization to another will, by definition, trigger a new encounter. Note that a transfer from one location to another may trigger a new encounter depending on whether the responsible organization has changed. A movement from one bed within the same ward to another probably will not, but a movement from one ward to another probably would.

stentry.p: Categorizes the patient transfer. Possible values include Admission, Transfer, Discharge, etc.
Date of the movement of the patient.
"Contains the short description of the reason for a patient location change." - HL7 Version 2.8, PV2-4
"Contains the prior patient location if the patient is being transferred. The old location is null if the patient is new." - HL7 Version 2.8, PV1-6
"Contains the prior patient location if the patient is being transferred. The old location is null if the patient is new." - HL7 Version 2.8, PV1-6
